column4: is there a guide on setting up apache and everything ..everytime i try it fails
there are HEAPS of guides on howto setup Apache 1 and Apache2

And anyway, the install of apache2 on ANY linux distro, source or package, really is quite simple (Source - "./configure; make; make install" BINARY: apt-get apache2 :: emerge apache2 :: yum apache2 :: swup apache2)
